info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 8:37PM EDT until July 08 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Davie County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northeastern Iredell County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 837 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Ronda to 12 miles southwest of Jonesville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Harmony, Love Valley, Sheffield, Union Grove, Turnersburg and Olin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
